languages.text: {n}Последнее слово заставляет офицеров, собравшихся подле вас, нервно рассмеяться — столь неуместно оно в устах воплощенной скверны против образа Человека. Исповедник тихо шепчет слова молитвы, пока Мастер дисциплины кривит губы и цепко ловит взглядом каждое движение поверженного врага.{/n}

{n}The creature's last word elicits a nervous laugh from the nearby enforcers — the irony of this embodied perversion of the human form accusing you of heresy is not lost on them. The confessor whispers a quiet prayer. The Master-at-Arms is watching the old man's every move, her lips twisted in contempt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Последнее слово заставляет офицеров, собравшихся подле вас, нервно рассмеяться — столь неуместно оно в устах воплощенной скверны против образа Человека. Исповедник тихо шепчет слова молитвы, пока Мастер дисциплины кривит губы и цепко ловит взглядом каждое движение поверженного врага.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À ce mot, les prévôts ne peuvent retenir un ricanement nerveux, amusés par l'ironie d'être traités d'hérétiques par une perversion de la forme humaine. Le confesseur murmure une prière silencieuse. La capitaine d'armes, quant à elle, ne quitte pas le vieil homme des yeux, les lèvres tordues par le mépris.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's last word elicits a nervous laugh from the nearby enforcers — the irony of this embodied perversion of the human form accusing you of heresy is not lost on them. The confessor whispers a quiet prayer. The Master-at-Arms is watching the old man's every move, her lips twisted in contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À ce mot, les prévôts ne peuvent retenir un ricanement nerveux, amusés par l'ironie d'être traités d'hérétiques par une perversion de la forme humaine. Le confesseur murmure une prière silencieuse. La capitaine d'armes, quant à elle, ne quitte pas le vieil homme des yeux, les lèvres tordues par le mépris.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las últimas palabras de la criatura provocan una risa nerviosa de los guardias cercanos: es irónico que esta perversión de la forma humana te acuse de herejía. El confesor susurra una oración en voz baja. La maestra de armas observa cada movimiento del anciano con una mueca de desprecio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's last word elicits a nervous laugh from the nearby enforcers — the irony of this embodied perversion of the human form accusing you of heresy is not lost on them. The confessor whispers a quiet prayer. The Master-at-Arms is watching the old man's every move, her lips twisted in contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las últimas palabras de la criatura provocan una risa nerviosa de los guardias cercanos: es irónico que esta perversión de la forma humana te acuse de herejía. El confesor susurra una oración en voz baja. La maestra de armas observa cada movimiento del anciano con una mueca de desprecio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这只生物最后这句话，不禁让周围的执法者紧张地笑了起来。眼前这只怪物简直就像是在讽刺人类本身，可他却在指责你们所有人是异端分子。告解神父轻声祈祷着，戒律大师紧紧盯着老人的一举一动，嘴唇轻蔑地扭曲着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's last word elicits a nervous laugh from the nearby enforcers — the irony of this embodied perversion of the human form accusing you of heresy is not lost on them. The confessor whispers a quiet prayer. The Master-at-Arms is watching the old man's every move, her lips twisted in contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只生物最后这句话，不禁让周围的执法者紧张地笑了起来。眼前这只怪物简直就像是在讽刺人类本身，可他却在指责你们所有人是异端分子。告解神父轻声祈祷着，戒律大师紧紧盯着老人的一举一动，嘴唇轻蔑地扭曲着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}この怪物の最後の言葉に、近くにいたエンフォーサーたちは緊張した笑いを浮かべた。この人間の形をした倒錯者が、あなたを異端として告発するという皮肉は、彼らにも分かるだろう。告解者は静かに祈りをささやく。その老師の一挙手一投足を、マスター・アット・アームズが侮蔑の眼差しで唇を歪めて見つめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's last word elicits a nervous laugh from the nearby enforcers — the irony of this embodied perversion of the human form accusing you of heresy is not lost on them. The confessor whispers a quiet prayer. The Master-at-Arms is watching the old man's every move, her lips twisted in contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この怪物の最後の言葉に、近くにいたエンフォーサーたちは緊張した笑いを浮かべた。この人間の形をした倒錯者が、あなたを異端として告発するという皮肉は、彼らにも分かるだろう。告解者は静かに祈りをささやく。その老師の一挙手一投足を、マスター・アット・アームズが侮蔑の眼差しで唇を歪めて見つめている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die letzten Worte der Kreatur lösen ein nervöses Lachen von den Enforcers in der Nähe aus. Ihnen entgeht nicht die Ironie darin, dass dich ausgerechnet diese Perversion der menschlichen Gestalt der Ketzerei bezichtigt. Der Beichtiger flüstert ein leises Gebet. Die Master-at-Arms beobachtet jede Bewegung des alten Mannes, den Blick voller Verachtung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's last word elicits a nervous laugh from the nearby enforcers — the irony of this embodied perversion of the human form accusing you of heresy is not lost on them. The confessor whispers a quiet prayer. The Master-at-Arms is watching the old man's every move, her lips twisted in contempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die letzten Worte der Kreatur lösen ein nervöses Lachen von den Enforcers in der Nähe aus. Ihnen entgeht nicht die Ironie darin, dass dich ausgerechnet diese Perversion der menschlichen Gestalt der Ketzerei bezichtigt. Der Beichtiger flüstert ein leises Gebet. Die Master-at-Arms beobachtet jede Bewegung des alten Mannes, den Blick voller Verachtung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaratığın son sözcüğü, yakınlardaki infazcıların öfkeli gülüşmelerine neden oluyor. İnsan biçiminin bu çarpıtılmış hâlinin seni kâfirlikle suçlamasındaki ironiyi açıkça görebiliyorlar. Günah çıkarıcı, sessiz bir dua fısıldıyor. Dudakları tiksintiyle bükülmüş olan Silahtar, ihtiyar adamın her bir hareketini dikkatle izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's last word elicits a nervous laugh from the nearby enforcers — the irony of this embodied perversion of the human form accusing you of heresy is not lost on them. The confessor whispers a quiet prayer. The Master-at-Arms is watching the old man's every move, her lips twisted in contempt.{/n}
